reviewText: I like it but its not quite for me-im a little more advanced and I probably should have thought more about this before I bought. but a GREAT video for beginner lifters-I think ill just use heavier weights
Title: The Spark: Fit, Firm & Fired Up in 10 Minutes a Day

reviewText: I purchased this dvd because I have the 28 day bootcamp dvd and really enjoy it.  This dvd has multiple different 10 minute toning workouts targeting various parts of the body.  It is not a cardio DVD.  It has a very basic production value and is just one person demonstrating exercises.  There is a bonus cardio workout that is about 15 minutes.  I like the Bootcamp DVD better but this is a good supplement.
Title: The Spark: Fit, Firm & Fired Up in 10 Minutes a Day

reviewText: I've been experimenting with 3 different workout DVDs this month:1.10 Minute Solution: 5 Day Get Fit Mix2. The Spark: Fit, Firm & Fired Up in 10 Minutes a Day3.Firm: Turbocharge Weight LossThis Spark DVD is probably my favorite.  Coach Nicole is wonderful - she comes across as your average, fit girl-next-door, not an overly perky, hardbody athletic trainer.  I'm old enough to think of her as a lovely daughter-in-law.  Love the 10-min workout segments and I, too, usually do 3 or 4 of them back-to-back to get a more demanding workout.  The moves are not complicated and are very user-friendly for beginners.  If you're not in good shape, rest assured that Nicole shows or tells you how to simplify almost everything, encouraging you to "just keep moving."  The10 Minute Solution: 5 Day Get Fit Mixis also an excellent choice and one I use often.Firm: Turbocharge Weight Lossis my least favorite of the three because it is fast and complicated and not (in my opinion) very user-friendly for the average lady with average coordination.
Title: The Spark: Fit, Firm & Fired Up in 10 Minutes a Day

reviewText: This is an great dvd from an awesome Healthy living, free site. It will go quite nicely with the Fitness Tracker and my program. Begins with easy exercises for each day of the week.
Title: The Spark: Fit, Firm & Fired Up in 10 Minutes a Day

reviewText: This is an awesome workout video for those people who don't have much time. I like it for when my day is too full to get to the gym, I can pop this baby in and get 10 minutes in.
Title: The Spark: Fit, Firm & Fired Up in 10 Minutes a Day

reviewText: If you are busy and have 10 minutes to spare, then this is the DVD for you!Head to toe exercise routines with little to no extra equipment, except a set of dumbbells and a floor mat.  Also a 15 minutes cardio routine.  Excellent DVD.Kudos Nicole!
Title: The Spark: Fit, Firm & Fired Up in 10 Minutes a Day

reviewText: I love these little workouts! Quick, simple, no nonsence, to the point 10 min sessions to fit in when you don't have a lot of time. Also very effective!
Title: The Spark: Fit, Firm & Fired Up in 10 Minutes a Day
